#include <iostream>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	string human,unwanted,alpha = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
	while(cin >> human >> unwanted)
	{
		map<char,int>alien;
		for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++)
			alien[alpha[i]] = 0;
			
		for(int i = 0; i < human.length(); i++)
			alien[human[i]]++;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < unwanted.length(); i++)
			if(alien[unwanted[i]] != 0)
				alien[unwanted[i]] = 0;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++)
			if(alien[alpha[i]] != 0)
			{
				cout << alpha[i] << alien[alpha[i]];
				//alien[human[i]] = 0;
			}
		cout << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
